name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thunderbit: AI Web Scraper & Web Automation

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate your repetitive copy-pasting tasks with ChatGPT. Use AI to scrape, summarize & autofill webpages with zero effort.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract data from websites, autofill web forms using site or file information, and summarize articles or videos with a single click. 🚀

Fast & easy web automation, no sign-in integration, no CSS selectors, no hassle. Let Thunderbit take care of the boring tasks so you can focus on what matters!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Features**

🕸️ AI Web Scraper 🕸️

Use natural language to collect all types of data—text, links, emails, images—from websites and save it to Notion, Airtable, Google Sheets, or download it as a CSV file. You can scrape an entire page into table format in 2 clicks.
    
✍️ AI Autofill ✍️
    
Automatically populate web forms using active web tabs and files. Supports text input, single/multi-select, and file uploads. Perfect for automating tasks across Google Sheets, Notion, Airtable, CRM, ATS, and more!
    
🤖 AI Web Assistant 🤖
    
Summarize any web article, email, or video with just one click.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**About**

Thunderbit is an AI Agent that replaces tedious copy-paste tasks. Ranked #1 Product of the Week and #3 Product of the Month on ProductHunt.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Support**

🎓 Website: https://thunderbit.com/
▶️ YouTube Videos: https://www.youtube.com/@thunderbit-ai
